titles.title: Insurance Industry Antitrust Enforcement Act of 2006
A bill to strengthen antitrust enforcement in the insurance industry.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/29/2006--Introduced. Insurance Industry Antitrust Enforcement Act of 2006 - Amends the McCarran-Ferguson Act to permit federal enforcement of antitrust laws and regulations pertaining to the insurance industry except to the extent that the states actively supervise the conduct of such industry or such conduct involves third-party data collection or other informational activities.
